title: Apidura Racing Aerobar Pack hangs streamlined bag under your aero extensions
content:
Apidura has reshaped a slimmer, streamlined front end for their fast ultra-distance audax bikepacking bag setup with a new Racing Aerobar Pack. Aiming for less frontal area to reduce energy-sapping drag, the new bag tucks neatly out front underneath your aero bar extensions, packing just enough gear inside, with room for snacks up top… Apidura […]

The post Apidura Racing Aerobar Pack hangs streamlined bag under your aero extensions appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
